content.raw:
Deadline: September 13.

* Phase 1:  
  ☑ Prepare for tech support weekend prior to deadline \(23rd is a Monday\)

    ☑ Review video submissions



    ☑ Publish results and make announcement, provided some fun/creative prizes, post/embedded videos   
    ☑ Press release


* Pre-phase 2:

    ☑ Create .yaml file for task 1 - Michael



    ☑ Create .yaml file for task 2 - Michael



    ☑ Create .yaml file for task 3 - Carlos



    ☑ Create .yaml file for task 4 - Carlos



    ☑ Create .yaml file for task 5 - Brian



    ☑ Create .yaml file for task 6 - Brian



    ☑ Dry-run of the automated evaluation with our own two solutions \(Tyler and Rumman\)



    * ☑ WAM-V generation
    * ☑ Task generation
    * ☑ Running competition
    * ☑ Upload logs to S3
    * ☑ Optional: Generate some videos
    

    ☑ Explore running the automated evaluation on AWS - Carlos



‌
